references.paper_title: Finite-time analysis of the multiarmed bandit problem
references.reason: This paper provides the foundational finite-time analysis of the multi-armed bandit problem, which is the basis for many contextual bandit algorithms used in the paper's model selection strategy.
This paper extends the multi-armed bandit problem to the non-stochastic setting, which is crucial for the paper's theoretical analysis in adversarial scenarios.

references.paper_title: Online active model selection for pre-trained classifiers
references.reason: This is the most directly related work to the paper, addressing online model selection with active learning but lacking the contextual aspect that this paper introduces.

references.paper_title: Minimizing regret with label efficient prediction
references.reason: This paper provides theoretical results on minimizing regret with limited labels, informing the regret analysis of the proposed contextual active model selection algorithm.
This paper introduces importance weighted active learning, providing a foundation for the active querying component of the proposed algorithm.
